description:
Design, implement, complete and report on an independent research project in agricultural sciences. Students commencing in Sem 1 must enrol in AGRC4611 for both semesters 1 & 2. Students commencing in Sem 2 must enrol in AGRC4612.

Students completing their project at the St Lucia campus or via external mode, please contact the School of Agriculture and Food Sciences for enrolment advice (agriculture@uq.edu.au).
